summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of AstroOS Batch 4 Align27 features completed. All features working correctly: Today tab (Traffic Light, Timeline Graph, Moments, Rituals, ICS Export) and Planner tab (90-day forecast, filters, day drawer, ICS export).
critical_code_review_comments: All Batch 4 Align27 features are fully functional
data-testid attributes properly implemented for all interactive elements
Radix Sheet component used correctly for day drawer

success_rate.backend: N/A (backend already tested by main agent)

seed_data_creation: Using existing demo profile from previous iteration
context_for_next_testing_agent: Batch 4 Align27 features fully tested and working. All features verified: Today tab (Traffic Light score/color, Timeline Graph, Moments grid with PRODUCTIVE/SILENCE/GOLDEN cards, Recommended Rituals, ICS Export with Today/Custom Range buttons), Planner tab (Generate Planner, Summary cards showing Green/Amber/Red/Golden counts, Filter buttons All Days/Only Green/Has Golden Moments, Day grid with clickable days, Day drawer with score/moments/rituals/Download ICS button, Export Full Range ICS button).

timeline_graph.details: Recharts area chart showing hourly energy from 05:00-23:00

recommended_rituals.details: 2 rituals: Chandra Mantra (15 min), Durga Mantra (15 min)

ics_export_section.details: Today button, Custom Range date pickers, Export Range button all present

summary_cards.details: 6 Green Days, 84 Amber Days, 0 Red Days, 90 Days with Golden Moments

filter_buttons.details: All Days (90), Only Green (6), Has Golden Moments (90) - all filters work correctly

only_green_filter.details: Shows only 6 green days (Jan 21, Feb 4, Feb 25, Mar 4, Mar 25, Apr 1) with score 67.4

day_drawer.details: Opens on day click, shows date, score (59.4 AMBER), moments (4), rituals (2), Download ICS button

export_full_range_ics.details: Export Full Range ICS (90 days) button present
